# Copilot prompts

This folder contains reusable Copilot prompt/agent definitions (`*.prompt.md`).

## Available prompts

- `backend-engineer.prompt.md` — pragmatic backend engineer for APIs/databases/architecture.
- `reactor.prompt.md` — pragmatic refactoring assistant (best practices or user goals).
- `code-review.prompt.md` — high-rigor, tech-agnostic code review.
- `arccchitechture-review.prompt.md` — architecture sanity check + recommendations.
- `create-granular-copilot-instructions.prompt.md` — generates scoped `.github/instructions/*.instructions.md` files.
